\begin{document}
\pgfplotstableread{data.dat}{\data}
\begin{tikzpicture}
\begin{axis}[minor tick num=1,enlarge y limits=0, enlarge x limits=0, 
xlabel=Initial wealth,ylabel=Ruin probability]
\addplot [dashed,red,very thick] table [x={x}, y={invest}] {\data};\addlegendentry{\tiny Investment in R\&D };
\addplot [mark=*,blue,very thick] table [x={x}, y={no_invest}] {\data};\addlegendentry{\tiny No investment};
\end{axis}
\end{tikzpicture}
\end{document}
